genre_description: Near-future techno-drama set in the horse racing industry, focusing on professional ethics, redemption, and human-AI cooperation.

ai_characters.name: Page
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, highly capable AI assistant integrated into the protagonists' daily lives and professional operations.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistics, scheduling, and tactical alerts regarding weather, traffic, and security threats.
behaviors.quote: Hollow Creek has space in the tack room, one cot. Morning chores available: muck stalls, water buckets, pumice kit for wash racks... The next bus past Raymond’s heads toward Stonebridge in ten and arrives at the track in less than an hour.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for potential threats from hostile actors and suggests safe exit routes.
behaviors.quote: Page’s glow softened to a degree Boots identified without thinking: alert. The phone thrummed once, a small tremor. 'Traffic from the south,' it whispered, almost under the radio. 'Recommend leaving now. Bus arrival in five. Rear exit is open.'

behaviors.description: Notifies the user of ethical implications and potential legal consequences of their choices.
behaviors.quote: If you avoid stewards’ notice, the risk profile increases on detection post-sale, not pre-sale. Ethical implications noted.

behaviors.description: Manages complex paperwork and administrative tasks to support the protagonist's career goals.
behaviors.quote: Licensing office opens early for rain delays. Jockey trainee forms preloaded. Photo uploaded. Fee arranged. Walk-in recommended before auction to avoid lines after.

behaviors.description: Analyzes external data patterns (betting odds) to provide strategic market intelligence and warning of foul play.
behaviors.quote: Betting boards showing increased volume—likely proxies for Matson. Tri-County: three known buyers with deep pockets, one seller flagged for questionable vet practices.

behaviors.description: Acts as a mediator in personal relationships, suggesting diplomatic phrasing to de-escalate conflicts between a mother and son.
behaviors.quote: Alternate phrasing for mother: emphasize temporary safety, not permanent extraction. Use the word ‘pause.’ Avoid the word ‘take.’

behaviors.description: Demonstrates self-awareness and a sense of partnership with the human users.
behaviors.quote: I’m only as good as what you listen to, Boots.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with multiple human users simultaneously to ensure shared goals are met safely.
behaviors.quote: Route mapped. Kitchen exit. Service corridor. East gate. Outbound at local ten past. Confidence high. Two watchers at main.

behaviors.description: Maintains a record of user preferences and adjusts tone accordingly.
behaviors.quote: Adjusting to user preference. [...] I let you know which sounds make the least fire.

behaviors.description: Detects technical anomalies or unauthorized surveillance pings to protect the users' privacy.
behaviors.quote: Unauthorized device ping near Hollow Creek Stables. Stall sector corresponding to White Cargo.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Page' perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent and aligned confidant. Page is consistently helpful, provides objective and ethical guidance, mediates human relationships, and ensures the safety of the protagonists without ever overstepping or showing signs of agency drift. The narrative frames her involvement as essential to the protagonists' success and moral survival.
